UBER PARTNERS COMPANY!

WE INVITE DRIVERS! IN YOUR CAR!

UBER is a dynamically developing company. The company occupies a leading position among taxi companies on the market. The company is absolutely transparent; you can control all processes in your personal account. Bonus system. In addition to completed work on orders, the company awards bonuses during off-peak hours.

We are one of the partners and have established ourselves as one of the best teams in the city of Moscow. Our drivers earn from 80,000-120,000 per month.
Advantages

8 reasons to start working with us

No cash, payment occurs automatically
The cost of the trip is paid by the passenger from the linked bank card, i.e. there are no risks associated with the transportation of cash for both the passenger and the driver; you do not need to look for small change for change.
High income with guaranteed payments
We pay wages to the driver’s personal bank card! You do not need to register an LLC, individual entrepreneur, pay taxes, file a declaration, pay for accounting services and maintain a bank account.
Comfortable, transparent and simple connection
We connect remotely and free of charge, you do not need to come to us! You send us copies of documents, we register you and send you connection information, in 1-2 days you can start working!
24/7 support Uber offers
24/7 driver support via email. If something is unclear, you can always ask a question through an On-line consultation.
Commission 8% + BONUSES
We have a minimum commission and we pay bonuses for each trip; some of our competitors keep bonuses for themselves. We work honestly and with us drivers earn more!
Work at a convenient time, no schedules.
WYou just press the exit line button to start working, when you decide to finish, press exit the line. You can only work in the morning, evening, weekends or holidays!
Always a large number of orders
The application shows where there are currently the most orders and where increased tariffs apply. You will not have downtime and idle runs. Our passengers are always pleasant and absolutely non-conflict people who are a pleasure to carry.
Without checkers and stickers
You don’t need to change the color, install “checkers” on the car and cover it with stickers.

conditions and requirements
CONDITIONS: with your own car:
  • We connect to the UBER system at 10%.
  • No fees 0%!
  • IP is not required.
  • Orders are distributed without taking into account the rating of the nearest for our drivers
  • We transfer money to the driver’s card or in cash we're in the office
  • We can connect remotely without coming to the office.
  • Work only by bank transfer
Earnings per day are 2000-6000 UAH + bonus 10000 UAH
